metadata.title: CVE-2017-18207 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The Wave_read._read_fmt_chunk function in Lib/wave.py inPython through 3.6.4 does not ensure a nonzero channel value, which allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero and exception) via acrafted wav format audio file. NOTE: the vendor disputes this issue becausePython applications "need to be prepared to handle a wide variety ofexceptions."

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
python3.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
